publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Windet] for Edward Blunt and William Barret,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: "Pelletier". Often attributed to Pierre Pelletier, but "plus vraisemblant l'œuvre de Thomas Pelletier"--Bibliothèque nationale cat.
A translation of: Discours lamentable sur l'attentat commis en la personne de très-heureuse mémoire Henri IIII.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Title page in facsimile from British Library copy.
